Class Summary
Client This class implements the client for pxchat.
Client.Holder  
ImageReceiver This class implements an image receiver that is able to read images sent by an ImageSender.
ImageSender This class implements a sender that is able the transfer images to other end-points.
Server This class implements the server for pxchat.
ServerImageReceiver An image receiver that forwards the incoming frames to a set of registered receivers.
